mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (id, password, email, name, age, date) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{name}, #{age}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, password, email, name, age, date FROM user ORDER BY id ASC;
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET is_deleted = TRUE, deleted_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT id, password, email, name, age, date as joinDate FROM user WHERE id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = FALSE
